moves.title: Falcon Dive (Up Special)
changes: Reverted bucket brake change, as it caused unintended side effects

moves.title: Bomb (Down Special)
changes: Added additional functionality to Samus’ bombs to work as intended on shield

changes.title: Default
changes: Adjusted multiple visual elements of the stage based on player feedback

changes.title: Green Hill Zone Brawl (X-Alt)
changes: Received visual update to match the base stage’s aesthetics

changes.title: Default
changes: Reduced echo effects based on player feedback

changes.title: Default
changes: Lowered the model of the top platform to better match the collisions

moves.title: Characters and Gameplay
changes: Fixed the Final Smash eyes on Kirby’s R-alt (Headphone Kirby)
Fixed an issue where the game would crash when attempting to fight Dark Peach in the Subspace Emissary

moves.title: Other
changes: Pressing Z to replace a tag when the tag list is full will now properly replace the tag
Fixed an issue where attempting to access the Stage Builder would crash the game

moves.title: Costumes
changes: Hooded Diddy Kong received a full revamp

moves.title: Music
changes: Castle Siege (Brawl) now uses the main slot’s tracklist instead of having a separate one
“Battle! Mewtwo” added to Rocket Hideout (Spear Pillar L-alt)
